function.name: browserbase_runner
function.description: Run a browser automation process to scrape and structure data from given URLs.

urls.description: A list of URLs to scrape and process.

returns.description: A list of dictionaries containing structured data for each successfully processed URL.

sideEffects: Saves the structured data to a local file named 'site_data_browserbase.json'.
raises: Any exceptions that occur during the browser automation or LLM processing are caught and printed, but do not stop the overall process.
notes: This function requires a valid BROWSERBASE_API_KEY environment variable to be set.
